Introduction

Riona is a Japanese singer formely under No.1 Media. She is a member of the girl group GG, the sub-unit PoshGirls-J, and a former member of the Japanese group AKB48.

She made her solo debut on August 29th, 2018 with the single album "Never Give Up!!".
